remarks:
Deduction for elimination by cases.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-1994.) 

---

 Variation of ~ ecased with three disjuncts instead of two.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-1994.)  (Revised by Jim Kingdon, 9-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ecase23d.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. ch ) $.
ecase23d.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. th ) $.
ecase23d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ ch \/ th ) ) $.
ecase23d $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
